zh: 驊科技榮獲「2008年德勤亞太高科技Fast 500」排名第37名
位於新竹科學園區的信驊科技，這家高度創新的fabless Soc –centric IC設計公司於2008年10月獲選「德勤亞太高科技 Fast 500」排名第37名，成為亞太地區成長最快獲利最高的高科技公司之一，同時也榮獲「台灣區高科技Fast50」第13名。由此公認信驊科技為一家世界級的SoC IC設計公司。
Deloitte德勤是經由公司連續三年的收入增長比例及整體財務表現來評鑑亞太區成長最快速的公司。此評比在業務成長、科技創新及企業精神方面賦予高度肯定與榮譽，並且成為全球科技業的標竿。
信驊科技於2005年10月推出第一代伺服管理處理器，並於6個月後達到季度財務收支平衡；2007年6月發布了第二代的伺服管理處理器，且再次創造全年淨利100萬美元以上。
關於 ASPEED信驊科技股份有限公司“信驊科技”成立於2004年11月，為一家高度創新的fabless半導體公司。致力於提供先進的SOC中央運算產品，包含矽晶片、IP以及相關軟體產品，此產品之應用目標為多媒體、影像與網路功能。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站 http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
媒體聯絡方式：吳俐俐行銷暨業務部資深行銷專員連絡電話：886-955-988-421Lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED Ranked 37 in Deloitte Technology Fast APAC 500 Award

Hsinchu, Taiwan, October, 2008- ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless SoC-centric IC design house not only has been chosen as one of the fastest growing company in APAC by Deloitte Technology Fast 500 Asia Pacific (Ranked 37), but also Technology Fast50 in Taiwan (Ranked 13).  This recognition has enable ASPEED Technology to establish itself as a world class SoC IC design house.

Deloitte recognize the fastest growing company in the Asia-Pacific region base on the percentage of revenue growth, overall financial performance of the company for three consecutive years.  The program also honors business growth, technological innovation and the entrepreneurial spirit and has become a benchmark for technology companies all over the world.

ASPEED first came out with 1st generation Server Management Processor at October 2005, and six months later it has achieved its financial breakeven quarterly.  Announcement of the 2nd generation Server Management Processor was at June 2007 and again achieved annual net profit over US$1M.

About ASPEED Technology Inc.ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, devotes itself to providing silicon chips, silicon IPs and software products that enable sophisticated SOC-centric multimedia, graphics and network applications. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
